## Overview

Reports is an automated reporting and data visualization package for graduate school data. The package cleans data from several different data sources for use in rmarkdown reports and a shiny application. Reports can be built directly from the rmarkdown documents and the shiny application though the shiny application is recommended.

## Installation

You can install the latest development version from github with

```{r}
if (packageVersion("devtools") < 1.6) {
  install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("benbarnard/Reports")
```

If you encounter a clear bug, please file a minimal reproducible example on github.
